title: How to Install Microsoft Office: Subscribe and Download

steps.title: Go to https://www.microsoft.com/.
steps.content: Go to https://www.microsoft.com/ . Then, select Microsoft 365 in the top menu bar. This is the official product page for Microsoft 365. In late 2022, Microsoft Office became part of Microsoft 365. Subscribing to Microsoft 365 gives you access to the apps that were part of Microsoft Office (e.g. Word, Excel, and PowerPoint). [1] X Research source There is also the option for a one-time purchase of Office Home & Student 2021, which includes the 2021 versions of Word, Excel, and PowerPoint.

steps.title: Click Buy now.
steps.content: Click Buy now . This is located in the top menu bar.

steps.title: Select a plan.
steps.content: Select a plan. Click Buy Now to start the purchasing process for a subscription plan. There are a few options: [2] X Research source Pay yearly or monthly. Select the Family plan if you have multiple users, or the Personal plan if it’s just for you.

steps.title: Sign in to your Microsoft Account.
steps.content: Sign in to your Microsoft Account. Then, follow the instructions to complete your purchase.

steps.title: Go to https://www.office.com/.
steps.content: Go to https://www.office.com/ . Click Sign in if you aren’t already signed in. [3] X Trustworthy Source Microsoft Support Technical support and product information from Microsoft. Go to source

steps.title: Click Install Office.
steps.content: Click Install Office . This is a button on the Office home page.

steps.title: Click Install.
steps.content: Click Install . It's a button in the Microsoft 365 subscription section. This might also be labeled Install Office > . The download for the Office setup file will start. [4] X Trustworthy Source Microsoft Support Technical support and product information from Microsoft. Go to source For work and student accounts, click Office 365 apps or Microsoft 365 apps instead.

steps.title: Click Save File.
steps.content: Click Save File . Your Office setup file will begin downloading. [5] X Trustworthy Source Microsoft Support Technical support and product information from Microsoft. Go to source You may have the options to select Run or Setup depending on your browser.

steps.title: Double-click the Office setup file.
steps.content: Double-click the Office setup file. You'll find it in your computer's default download location. [6] X Research source Skip this step if the installation has already started.

steps.title: Click Yes when prompted.
steps.content: Click Yes when prompted. You may see a prompt asking “Do you want to allow this app to make changes to your device?” Selecting Yes will run the setup file and begin installing Office on your computer. [7] X Research source

steps.title: Wait for Microsoft Office to finish installing.
steps.content: Wait for Microsoft Office to finish installing. This process may take several minutes.

steps.title: Click Close when prompted.
steps.content: Click Close when prompted. Your Microsoft Office programs have now been installed on your computer. You can begin using these programs right away. [8] X Trustworthy Source Microsoft Support Technical support and product information from Microsoft. Go to source You ready to start using vlookup in Excel or check out some templates in Word .

steps.title: Go to https://account.microsoft.com/.
steps.content: Go to https://account.microsoft.com/ . This will take you to your Microsoft account dashboard. [9] X Trustworthy Source Microsoft Support Technical support and product information from Microsoft. Go to source Click Sign in to sign in if you aren’t already.

steps.title: Click Services and subscriptions.
steps.content: Click Services and subscriptions . This is a tab at the top of the Microsoft account dashboard page.

steps.title: Click Install.
steps.content: Click Install . This is located next to the version of Office you’ve purchased. [10] X Trustworthy Source Microsoft Support Technical support and product information from Microsoft. Go to source

steps.title: Click Save File.
steps.content: Click Save File . Your Office setup file will begin downloading. [11] X Trustworthy Source Microsoft Support Technical support and product information from Microsoft. Go to source You may have the options to select Run or Setup depending on your browser.

steps.title: Double-click the Office setup file.
steps.content: Double-click the Office setup file. You'll find it in your computer's default download location. [12] X Research source Skip this step if the installation has already started.

steps.title: Click Yes when prompted.
steps.content: Click Yes when prompted. You may see a prompt asking “Do you want to allow this app to make changes to your device?” Selecting Yes will run the setup file and begin installing Office on your computer. [13] X Research source

steps.title: Wait for Microsoft Office to finish installing.
steps.content: Wait for Microsoft Office to finish installing. This process may take several minutes.

steps.title: Click Close when prompted.
steps.content: Click Close when prompted. Your Microsoft Office programs have now been installed on your computer. You can begin using these programs right away. For Office 2013, you’ll see a window that says “You’re good to go.” Click All done! to close the window and start using Office.

steps.title: Go to https://www.office.com/.
steps.content: Go to https://www.office.com/ . Click Sign in if you aren’t already signed in.

steps.title: Click Install Office.
steps.content: Click Install Office . This is a button on the Office home page. If you signed in to a work or student account, select Office 365 apps or Microsoft 365 apps after clicking Install Office .

steps.title: Open Finder.
steps.content: Open Finder. It's a blue, face-shaped app in your Mac's Dock.

steps.title: Click Downloads.
steps.content: Click Downloads . This folder is on the left side of the Finder window. If your browser downloads files to a different folder (e.g., your desktop), click that folder's name instead.

steps.title: Double-click the Office setup file.
steps.content: Double-click the Office setup file. Doing so will prompt it to begin running. [14] X Research source If you receive an error saying that the file can't be installed: Try verifying the download before continuing. Microsoft is a signed developer, but Microsoft software doesn't always work flawlessly on a Mac. You can also try waiting 10 seconds and trying again. If the window says “Verifying” but seems to be stuck, close that window and try again.

steps.title: Click Continue twice.
steps.content: Click Continue twice. It's in the bottom-right corner of the page. You'll do this once on the first page of the setup, and then again on the second page.

steps.title: Click Agree.
steps.content: Click Agree . This will indicate that you agree to Microsoft's terms of use.

steps.title: Click Continue.
steps.content: Click Continue . It's in the bottom-right corner of the page.

steps.title: Click Install.
steps.content: Click Install . This button is in the bottom-right corner of the page.

steps.title: Enter your Mac's password.
steps.content: Enter your Mac's password. Type in the password you use to log into your Mac.

steps.title: Click Install Software.
steps.content: Click Install Software . It's in the bottom-right corner of the password entry window. Doing so will begin installing Microsoft Office on your computer. The installation process may take a while.

steps.title: Click Close when prompted.
steps.content: Click Close when prompted. Your Microsoft Office programs have now been installed on your computer. You're free to begin using these programs right away.

steps.title: Go to https://account.microsoft.com/.
steps.content: Go to https://account.microsoft.com/ . This will take you to your Microsoft account dashboard.
